name: KAIJU (Tom "Skeletom" Farro)
description:
Help the DEEP DIVERS collect treasure while avoiding an annoyed NORMAL GIRL's tentacles!

OBJECTIVE

Collect TREASURE by pressing RIGHT against the TREASURE PILE at the bottom of the ocean for 1 PT apiece. Return to the BOAT with TREASURE in hand for an additional 3 PTs. Your friends are fickle, and will ONLY let you back on the BOAT with TREASURE in hand!

Avoid MARI's TENTACLES at all costs! The more TREASURE you steal, the faster she will lash out! Every 25 PTs earns an EXTRA LIFE, up to 2 in reserve.

CONTROLS

Move: A/D, Left/Right arrow keys, On-Screen buttons

CREDITS

Fan game for Furuya Mari (https://twitter.com/furuya_mari)

Based on OCTOPUS (1981, Nintendo)

Art by bon (https://twitter.com/chiffles_)

Programming by Skeletom (https://twitter.com/FomTarro)

Audio and Font provided by Kenney (https://kenney.nl/)

Additional Textures provided by erxer1

Created in 36 hours for the 2nd VTuber Game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/2nd-vtuber-game-jam)
